head.title: Change {{FileFormatUp}} pages orientation in {{EnvName}} apps
head.description: Use {{ProdFullName}} to control orientation (portrait or landscape) of {{FileFormatUp}} pages. COntrol content and appearance of PDFs, Word documents, Excel spreadsheets, PowerPoint presentations, Visio, images, archives, and more with our solutions.

header.title: Page orientation control in {{FileFormatUp}}
header.description: {{ProdFullName}} provides useful abilities for {{EnvNameShort}} applications. Developers can extend their solutions and control content of many popular business formats using features like changing {{FileFormatUp}} pages orientation.
header.subtitle: {{ProdFullName}}

about.title: {{ProdShortName}} Overview
about.content: [{{ProdFullName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) is a solution designed to control content and appearance of documents in more than 50 file formats, including PDF, Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Visio, images, archives, etc. It enables merging, splitting, extracting, moving, swapping, removing pages, and changing orientation. Include powerful document management features in your applications.

more_features.title: Flexible document content management
more_features.description: {{ProdFullName}} provides a comprehensive set of features for controlling content of many popular file formats. More than 50 document formats may be processed efficiently.

feature_1.title: Merge various file formats
feature_1.content: Combine PDFs, Word documents, presentations, spreadsheets, Visio diagrams, images, and archives. Use customization options for optimal results.

feature_2.title: Manage document pages
feature_2.content: Rearrange pages by moving, swapping, or deleting them to better organize your content.

feature_3.title: Control page layout
feature_3.content: Rotate pages to a specific angle or switch between portrait and landscape orientations.

feature_4.title: Extract pages as separate files
feature_4.content: Select a single page or a range of pages and save them as a new file in a specified location.

formats.title: Change page orientation for many formats
formats.description: {{ProdShortName}} supports over 50 file formats, allowing you to modify documents effortlessly with a wide range of operations.

operations.title: Key features
operations.description: Explore our features that may be useful in your solutions.

examples.comment_2: Specify which page needs orientation changing

content.title: Use [{{ProdShortName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) to {{FileFormatUp}} pages orientation. This and other features provide useful document management capabilities for {{EnvName}} projects.
content.step_2: Choose the page number which need be processed.

code_1.title: Change orientation of the last page in {{FileFormatUp}} doc
code_1.content: Investigate how to get number of pages in {{FileFormatUp}} document and change orientation of the last page.
code_1.comment_1: Load the source file into the constructor
code_1.comment_2: Retrieve the total number of pages
code_1.comment_3: Provide the page number and desired (portrait or landscape) orientation
code_1.comment_5: Save the result file to output path
